name: SOUP TIME (Jhunter)
description:
A frog who loves to cook follows his dreams and makes tomato soup. He loves cooking and his family. This cooking game has you complete 3 tasks to make soup in the allotted time. If you're too slow, you fail! 

I am aware of a few bugs that are quite disruptive, such as cutting boards spawning and disappearing rapidly. This game was made in under 48 hours and I could not for the life of me figure out a fix. I may update the game in the  future, but who knows. I am happy with how things turned out for such a short time period! Music, SFX, art, were all made by me. I used a color palette called Choco Dream, by Potvii.
